name: photo-processor
description: Race photo processing application with automatic bib number detection

scripts.dev:backend: cd backend && source venv/bin/activate && python -m uvicorn main:app --reload --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8000
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && python3 -m venv venv && source venv/bin/activate && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.install:backend: cd backend && source venv/bin/activate && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.start: cd backend && source venv/bin/activate && python3 -m uvicorn main:app --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8000
